eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.border

Class HCPEmptyBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.border.HCPEmptyBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HCPElement

    public class HCPEmptyBorder
extends Object
implements HCPElement
    An HCPElement wrapper which adds an empty border of a fixed size around the element. The border can have different sizes on the four different sides of the element.

    The getWidth() and getHeight() methods return the sum of the element's size and the size of the border.

    The element's HCPElement.paint(PDPageContentStream, PDRectangle) method will not be called if there is no space left for the element.

    This class is immutable.

      • paint

        public void paint(PDPageContentStream content,
                  PDRectangle shape)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: HCPElement
        Paints this element to the specified PDPageContentStream.

        Shape defines the position and size which should be used for painting. If the size is less than specified by HCPElement.getWidth() and HCPElement.getHeight() then this method does not guarantee that (a) the requested size is used or (b) the element is painted correctly or (c) the element is painted at all.

        Specified by:
        paint in interface HCPElement
        Parameters:
        content - not null
        shape - not null
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error writing to the stream
